results.title: Discovering reinforcers (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: John Socha and Macomb Community College Instructional Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Effective Behavioural Programming”.
Tape 1 : The use of reinforcers in the classroom is the key to motivating students. Reinforcers are events that follow a response and increase the probability that the response will occur again. Retarded people have fewer reinforcers. It is important for a teacher to discover appropriate reinforcers for the particular class NB. This tape is on 525 line NTSC.

results.title: Gourmet Fish Cooking
results.brief_description: This excellent video provides viewers with an easy to follow step by step guide to gourmet fish cooking. International chef, Peter Jarmer, passes on the tricks of the trade in selecting and filleting fish, cooking techniques and the art of exquisite presentation. Rated: G

results.title: Goodbye Lynn
results.brief_description: Tells the story of Lynn, a teenager, unwed and pregnant, and the problems she faces with her family, school friends, teachers, doctors and her boyfriend. Focuses on the interpersonal relationships and emotional stresses that affected the girl.

results.title: Good housekeeping: for men only
results.brief_description: A safety film for employees in the building industry. Shows how to increase efficiency and reduce accidents by proper use and storage of materials and by taking proper precautions in the course of the building activities.

results.title: Good health: talking feet
results.creator_credit: Albert Wallace, Philip Grosset and ATV Colour Productions
results.brief_description: Presents information on foot care and correct shoe fitting. Indicates problems caused by poorly fitted shoes, and the types of remedies appropriate to corns, tinea and warts.

results.title: Golf: a special kind of joy
results.creator_credit: Tom Hilderbrand and National Golf Foundation
results.brief_description: Part 1 of the Modern Golf Instruction series. Places importance on building a swing to suit each individual player. Looks at the role of each golf club in obtaining loft and length and demonstrates the use of each club group. The language of golf is discussed and the handicap system explained.

results.title: Golden Transvaal
results.creator_credit: John Da Silva and South African Tourist Corporation
results.brief_description: Within the borders of the Transvaal is to be found a wide diversity of attractions, both natural and manmade. These include Johannesburg, historic Pretoria, the flat plains and mountain ranges and the warm sub-tropical Lowveld, and the Kruger National Park.

results.title: Gold the sacred metal
results.creator_credit: Jeri Sopanen, Lewis Bushnell and Kena Productions
results.brief_description: This film is about gold and what people will do for and with it. For gold, the Conquistadors waged wars and with their superior weapons defeated the Latin American Indians. The film shows the descendants of these Indians, the Koguis, who still survive in small villages. Twice a year they dance with golden masks.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeri Sopanen, Lewis Bushnell and Kena Productions

results.title: Gold from the sea: epics of salvage
results.creator_credit: A G Harbrow and United Salvage
